Package diergo.spring.legacy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SmartBeanDefinitionCustomizer
    Callback for customizing a given bean definition if the current state is supported.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRegistryPostProcessor  
    CustomizingTypeFilter<T extends Member>
    Support class to combine type filtering, bean definition filtering and customizing as needed by the post processor.
    LegacyBeanMethodFilter
    A type filter creating bean definitions for methods without parameters returning a valid bean type.
    LegacyBeanRegistryPostProcessor
    A post processor registering all legacy singletons as spring beans.
    LegacyBeanRegistryPostProcessorBuilder
    Builder to configure a post processor registering beans from legacy code.
    LegacyFactoryBeanScanner
    Creates a number of bean definitions based on a unique registered bean definition and its matching factory methods.
    LegacySingletonFieldFilter
    A type filter creating bean definitions for fields with a valid bean type.
    LegacySpringAccess
    Support access to Spring beans from outside an application context.
    MemberPredicates
    Predicates to filter methods and fields.
